text: The station Le Stade is a railway station in Colombes, Hauts-de-Seine department, in the northwestern suburbs of Paris, France. ==History== The station was opened in 1924 to serve the Stade Olympique Yves-du-Manoir for the Summer Olympic Games. ==Line serving this station== * SNCF Gare Saint-Lazare (Banlieue)–Ermont–Eaubonne (Terminus) ==See also== * List of stations of the Paris RER ==External links== * Category:Railway stations in Hauts-de-Seine Category:Railway stations in France opened in 1924 Category:1924 Summer Olympics
title: Le Stade station
